name: Veritas - Torch Habano - Torpedo
additionalNotes: The Veritas Torch Habano is a mild to medium stick that received a 92 Rating from Cigar & Spirits Magazine. This award-winning premium cigar is known for its rich subtle flavors and delivering a mellow smoking experience. The Veritas Cigar Co. was established in 2011. Veritas is Latin for “Truth without fear,” which is the motto from the high school attended by Chris Weber, the company’s Chairman. It is also the driving edict behind the Veritas Cigar Co.
